name: ConversationStarterforCouples
0:
”Alexa, ask Conversation Starter for today's question”
”Alexa, ask Conversation Starter what is the question for Thursday”
”Alexa, ask Conversation Starter for May 12th's conversation starter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conversation starter
des:
Good communication and conversation is an important aspect to any marriage. But sometimes knowing what to talk about can be difficult. Conversation Starter provides a new question for each day of the year to help serve as a starting point for you and your spouse to engage in meaningful conversation.

Did you miss a day and would like to hear what you missed? You can always ask for a different day's question (today, yesterday, Thursday, May 12th, etc).

The questions for this app were provided by Lori at http://www.the-generous-wife.com for couple development and marriage ministry. Please see her website for more information.
